mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO, AUTHORITY, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, NICKNAME, USER_BIRTH, USER_GENDER, USER_PHONE, USER_EMAIL, USER_ADDRESS, USER_ENROLL_DATE, USER_MODIFY_DATE, USER_POINT FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_PWD = #{userPwd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO ( USER_NO, AUTHORITY, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, NICKNAME, USER_BIRTH, USER_GENDER, USER_PHONE, USER_ADDRESS ) VALUES ( SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL, 'N', #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{nickName}, #{userBirth}, #{userGender}, #{userPhone}, #{userAddress} )
